message:
“Bill Calls For Study on Cryptocurrency Use in Sex Trafficking”
Traffickers are always changing their tactics which is why law enforcement need current and up to date training.

data.description: The U.S. government may investigate how cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin are being used in sex trafficking under a bill proposed by the House Financial Services Committee on June 12. According to a June 11 memorandum, the “Fight Illicit Networks and Detect (FIND) Trafficking Act” would require t...
data.title: Bill Calls For Study on Cryptocurrency Use in Sex Trafficking
